title: The Best Mountain Bike Lights of 2021: Ride Illuminated Into Fall
content:
As days get shorter, you may find yourself suddenly pulling a lot more ‘dawn patrols’ or night riding on the trails. If you’re new to night riding on the mountain bike, you’ll quickly realize that the handy little light that you use for your road rides or commutes just isn’t cutting it on gnarly singletrack.

author: Molly Hurford
